properties.name: .env.directory
properties.description: Specify the directory containing your .env file.

properties.name: .env.filename
properties.description: Specify a filename other than the .env default name.

properties.name: .env.ignoreIfMalformed
properties.description: Do not throw when .env entries are malformed. Malformed entries are skipped.

properties.name: .env.ignoreIfMissing
properties.description: Do not throw when .env does not exist.

properties.name: .env.systemProperties
properties.description: Load environment variables into System properties, thus making all environment variables accessible via System.getProperty(...).

properties.name: .env.prefix
properties.description: Specify the prefix for Spring properties to make use of the .env property source.
